TopicTitle: OSX: beachball of death on application launch

Articles.Content:
KSP Version 

build id = 01289
2016-06-21_20-33-48
Branch: master

Objective

Want to launch KSP to play. The KSP window appears, but it is black. After a few moments, the beachball appears, then I have to force quit.

Installation

Installed it 2 weeks ago via Steam. Played yesterday night without issue. This morning the problem happened and I can no longer play.

Edited August 7, 2016 by rocketman768

Did you install or update any software (or change some component of your computer) between night and morning?
